message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a unique and high-demand item that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm confident you'll find it worth every penny. I'm willing to start with an offer of $900,000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I see the value in this product, $900,000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to offer $750,000 for it, reflecting its worth to me and leaving room for us both to find common ground. Let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I have to consider the value that I've placed on this product. While $750,000 is a good starting point, I'm not quite ready to meet you at that price. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. I'm thinking of a price of $950,000. Let's see if we can find a sweet spot.

Alice, I understand your position, but $950,000 is still a stretch for me. I'm willing to go up to $800,000. This price reflects the value I see in the product while also being within my budget. It's a fair offer, and I hope we can reach an agreement.
